item.description:
Let's go back to where it all begin. This is the where our group's inaugural happy hour was held, during Jane's reign. Charley's is a saloon styled bar and eatery, which is one of the most popular local after work spots. So join us downstairs and you'll find me at the bar wearing a Happy New Year tiara.

Get there when you can. I'll arrive at 5:30 PM and hang until ????

The first new member who finds me, gets a free drink. Don't be shy...Say hi

PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER - THANK YOU

They do meat quite well here, so if you need some food, go for a burger, steak, or chicken.

Here's Charley's Menu

Check out MBTA or Hop Stop to plan your public transportation route.

five (5) minute walk from

Green Line Hynes subway station
or
Green Line Copley Square subway station
or
# 1 Mass Ave bus
(Mass Ave and Boylston Street stop)
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be downstairs at the bar wearing a Happy New Year tiara
item.name: Boston Happy Hour First Meetup Again
